response.summary: Tengo experiencia académica y laboral en el desarrollo de productos. Mis mayores intereses son precisamente la industria del consumo masivo, tanto alimentos como productos en general. Tengo gran interés en aprender y trabajar en el desarrollo de productos que permitan satisfacer las necesidades de los consumidores, entendiendo como se realiza un estudio de mercado, luego una formulación y por último la venta del producto.
response.skills: Responsabilidad, Compromiso, Herramientas informáticas, Ordenado , Capacidad de análisis

profile_positions.title: Prácticante/Asistente Laboratorio de aplicación de fragancias

company.name: MSD
company.description: At MSD, known as Merck & Co., Inc., Rahway, NJ, USA in the United States and Canada, we are unified around our purpose: We use the power of leading-edge science to save and improve lives around the world. For more than 130 years, we have brought hope to humanity through the development of important medicines and vaccines. We aspire to be the premier research-intensive biopharmaceutical company in the world – and today, we are at the forefront of research to deliver innovative health solutions that advance the prevention and treatment of diseases in people and animals. We foster a diverse and inclusive global workforce and operate responsibly every day to enable a safe, sustainable and healthy future for all people and communities. For more information, visit www.msd.com and connect with us on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and YouTube.
